statements: SELECT * FROM supply_chain ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM supply_chain WHERE price > 1000;
SELECT supplier_name, manufacturer_name, production_date FROM supply_chain WHERE certification = 'ISO 9001';
SELECT * FROM supply_chain WHERE category = 'Electronics' AND manufacturer_location = 'USA';
SELECT product_id, product_name, supplier_name, price FROM supply_chain ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM supply_chain WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY price DESC, production_date ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT product_name, supplier_name, price FROM supply_chain WHERE manufacturer_name = 'ABC Electronics' ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT manufacturer_name, manufacturer_location, certification FROM supply_chain WHERE supplier_location = 'USA' ORDER BY manufacturer_location;
SELECT product_name, supplier_name, price FROM supply_chain WHERE certification IN ('ISO 9001', 'ISO 14001') AND price < 1000 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT product_name, supplier_name, certification, price FROM supply_chain WHERE category = 'Clothing' AND supplier_location = 'Italy' ORDER BY supplier_name, certification DESC;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT name, brand, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT name, color, quantity FROM products JOIN shipments ON products.id = shipments.product_id;
SELECT id, name, price FROM products WHERE material = 'Leather' ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT supplier, ship_date FROM shipments WHERE quantity >= 100 ORDER BY ship_date;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE price > 50
SELECT id, name, category FROM products WHERE brand = 'Nike' AND category = 'Shoes'
SELECT p.name, p.price, s.supplier FROM products p JOIN shipments s ON p.id = s.product_id WHERE s.quantity > 10
SELECT p.name AS product_name, s.supplier AS supplier_name, s.ship_date FROM products p INNER JOIN shipments s ON p.id = s.product_id WHERE s.ship_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT category, COUNT(*) AS total_products FROM products GROUP BY category HAVING COUNT(*) > 5 ORDER BY total_products DESC
SELECT * FROM product;
SELECT name, brand FROM product WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT id, name, category FROM product WHERE brand = 'Nike';
SELECT * FROM supplier WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT id, supplier_id, product_id, quantity FROM shipment ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT * FROM product WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT name, brand FROM product WHERE brand = 'Apple';
SELECT * FROM supplier WHERE location = 'New York' ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT p.name AS product_name, s.name AS supplier_name, sh.quantity FROM product p JOIN shipment sh ON p.id = sh.product_id JOIN supplier s ON s.id = sh.supplier_id WHERE sh.quantity > 10;
SELECT p.name AS product_name, sh.date AS shipment_date FROM product p JOIN shipment sh ON p.id = sh.product_id WHERE sh.date BETWEEN '2021-08-01' AND '2021-08-31';
SELECT * FROM product;
SELECT product_id, product_name, price FROM product WHERE price > 50;
SELECT supplier_name, location FROM supplier ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT product_name, brand_name, material FROM product WHERE brand_name = 'Nike';
SELECT * FROM warehouse WHERE capacity >= 100 ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT product_name, brand_name, price FROM product WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM product WHERE material = 'Wood' AND brand_name = 'BrandA';
SELECT supplier_name, location FROM supplier WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT product_id, supplier_id, quantity FROM shipment WHERE quantity >= 50 ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM warehouse WHERE capacity > 1000 ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, category FROM products WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM orders ORDER BY order_id DESC;
SELECT product_name, location FROM products p JOIN suppliers s ON p.supplier_id = s.supplier_id;
SELECT shipment_id, product_name, quantity FROM shipments JOIN products ON shipments.product_id = products.product_id;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, category FROM products ORDER BY category, product_name DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, location FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 1;

SELECT p.product_name, s.location, o.quantity FROM products p JOIN orders o ON p.product_id = o.product_id JOIN warehouses w ON o.product_id = w.warehouse_id JOIN suppliers s ON p.supplier_id = s.supplier_id WHERE o.quantity > 100;
SELECT product_name, category, material FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
